Package crazyballrun.game.gui

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GUIConfigurationParser
    The GUIConfigurationParser reads the GUI configuration file and translates it into different GUI-screens (called "Frames") and their content (GUI controls like buttons, textboxes, messages, etc.).
    GUIControl
    The abstract class GUIControl provides basic functionality for GUI controls and an interface for the implementation of GUI-elements.
    GUIControlFactory
    The GUIControlFactory is used to create any possible GUI component by a unique string identifier.
    GUIEngine
    The GUIEngine interacts strongly with the GraphicsEngine for rendering of graphical user interface and additionally handles the IControl-GUI- interaction.
    GUIFrame
    The GUIFrame defines on menu-screen with a couple of GUIControls.
